General.Name: Formosa International Hotels Corp
General.Description: Formosa International Hotels Corporation operates hotels in Taiwan and internationally. It operates hotels under the Regent Taipei, Silks Place, Wellspring By Silks, Silks Club, and Just Sleep brands; and restaurants under the Silks Palace, Spice Market, Just Grill, and Garden Villa brand names. Formosa International Hotels Corporation was founded in 1990 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.3, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
